module.name: hipay
module.description: Manage your online transactions without a distance-selling (VAD) contract and with an integrated anti-fraud system
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Manage your online transactions without a distance-selling (VAD) contract and with an integrated anti-fraud system. You can access all international and local payment solutions (Visa, MasterCard, ING, Bancontact Mistercash, Sofort, Payshop, Boleto bancario, Ideal, Sisal...)

module.name: skrill
module.description: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 cur
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 currencies.
module.additional_description: Free and quick setupAccess 100+ local payment solutions with 1 easy integrationConnect with 30+ million Skrill account holdersHighest security standards and anti-fraud technologySeamless payment experience across mobile, tablet and desktop

module.name: paypal
module.description: Please your customers with one of the best payment solutions. With over 143 million active accounts worldwide, PayPal is a leader in payment solutions on web and mobile
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Please your customers with one of the best payment solutions. With over 143 million active accounts worldwide, PayPal is a leader in payment solutions on web and mobile. Available in 193 countries in 26 currencies, PayPal is also one of the most recognised and trusted online payment solutions by the customers

module.name: ogone
module.description: Ingenico ePayments*: Online payment services to boost conversion   We offer innovative ecommerce solutions for more than 160,000 customers in Europe and worldwide   *Formely known as Ogone&n
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Ingenico ePayments*: Online payment services to boost conversion   We offer innovative ecommerce solutions for more than 160,000 customers in Europe and worldwide   *Formely known as Ogone
module.additional_description: There are many ways your business benefits from choosing Ingenico ePayments as its payments partner : We process and secure internet payments. Whether you have an online or mobile webshop, or take orders by phone, we'll help you accept payments, receive funds, and protect your business from fraudsters.

module.name: twenga
module.displayName: Advanced traffic acquisition on the Twenga network
module.description: Integrate your product feed onto the Twenga search engine, as well as on over 1,500 partner sites, thanks to Smart LEADS by Twenga Solutions
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Integrate your product feed onto the Twenga search engine, as well as on over 1,500 partner sites, thanks to Smart LEADS by Twenga Solutions.
module.additional_description: Smart LEADS is a completely automated qualified traffic acquisition solution, which is aimed at e-retailers of all sizes. It generates visibility and optimises advertising campaign performance, in real-time, within the Twenga network. This network includes Twenga's shopping engine websites and over 1,500 international partner sites including price comparison sites, shopping guides and editorial sites. About Smart LEADS: Smart LEADS analyses product performance using many different indicators (conversions, average spend, best selling products...).Customer profiling based on 40 different factors (search history, customer type, location, time...)Calculate buyers' affinity with your products.Rank products according to performance criteria and affinity, and push those with the highest probability of generating sales. This logic is applied, in real-time, for each product display on the Twenga network. Increase sales and improve revenue with a unique solution! 2* ConversionTarget highly qualified users and audiences3* ClientsSignificantly increase your sales and client base6* RevenueOptimise your cost per acquisition objectives at the finest level

module.name: cashondelivery
module.description: Accept cash on delivery payments
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Accept cash on delivery payments

module.name: ganalytics
module.description: Your customers go everywhere; shouldn't your analytics? Google Analytics shows you the full customer picture across ads and videos, websites and social tools, tablets and smartphones
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Your customers go everywhere; shouldn't your analytics? Google Analytics shows you the full customer picture across ads and videos, websites and social tools, tablets and smartphones. That makes it easier to serve your current customers and win new ones.
module.additional_description: An ad click here, a page view there, a video watched on a tablet before bed... but which one clinched the sale? Google Analytics has the latest in full-credit measurement, so you see all the stops people take on the road to action. The result: a measurable way to improve campaigns and reach new audiences as they go through their days.

module.name: shoppingfluxexport
module.description: A single platform to List, Sync, and Manage your products and orders with the world's largest marketplaces and shopping engines
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: A single platform to List, Sync, and Manage your products and orders with the world's largest marketplaces and shopping engines.
module.additional_description: Sell your products List on Amazon, eBay, Google Shopping, Bing Ads, 11 Main, Rakuten, eBay Commerce Network, shopping.com, Shopzilla, PriceGrabber, and more than 1000 other sales channels internationally. Enhance Your Data Our DataFix Toolbox easily patches holes in your product data that would otherwise prevent you from listing and selling your products on a sales channel. Never Pay for Setup Shopping Feed's Automated setup gets you up and running on your favorite sales channels in a flash. Our dedicated support team will make sure you get connected, no matter how complicated the setup.

module.name: authorizeaim
module.description: Authorize.Net is a leading payment solution that makes accepting payments safe, easy and affordable. Over 400,000 merchants trust Authorize
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Authorize.Net is a leading payment solution that makes accepting payments safe, easy and affordable. Over 400,000 merchants trust Authorize.Net to manage their payment transactions securely and reliably.  Get Started Now- Open an Account Today﻿

module.name: avalaratax
module.description: Overview Avalara AvaTax provides the fastest, easiest, most accurate and affordable way to calculate sales tax within PrestaShop, manage exemption certificates, file returns, and remit payments across
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Overview Avalara AvaTax provides the fastest, easiest, most accurate and affordable way to calculate sales tax within PrestaShop, manage exemption certificates, file returns, and remit payments across multiple tax regions.
module.additional_description: AvaTax calculates accurate sales tax based on geo-spatial mapping.Your data is seamlessly integrated with PrestaShop.Tax reports at your fingertips, including tax returns and audits.Stress free returns processing. Your filing is done on time, every time. Guaranteed.For as little as $5/month!Get started today!  http://www.avalara.com/integrations/prestashop/

module.additional_description: Enjoy the benefits of version 1.6 of PrestaShop in one click with this module that allows you to update easily your online store!

module.name: gadwords
module.description: Show your ad to people at the very moment they are searching for what you offer
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Show your ad to people at the very moment they are searching for what you offer. Google and PrestaShop increase your advertising investment by offering £75 after the first spent £25  (or 75€ for 25€ if you are not based in the UK) !  Download the module to get your promotional code and start your campaign now !
module.additional_description: Are you looking for new clients online? Prestashop has partnered with Google to help you find them. With Google AdWords, you can display your ads on Google and its advertising network. This makes your business visible online to potential customers. To help you get started, we've partnered with Google to give you £75* in advertising credit when you spend £25 on your first AdWords campaign.  Receive £75* in advertising credit when you spend £25 on your first AdWords campaign. Or call 08001690713

module.name: sendinblue
module.description: SendinBlue : THE all-in-one module for your (marketing and transactional) email, newsletter & SMS
module.author: SendinBlue
module.description_full: SendinBlue : THE all-in-one module for your (marketing and transactional) email, newsletter & SMS. Synchronize your Prestashop subscribers with SendinBlue, easily create beautiful email campaigns and efficiently communicate with your prospects and clients.
module.additional_description: With SendinBlue, you can:Automatically synchronize your contacts on SendinBlue and pull up your salesCreate and send beautiful newslettersOptimize deliverability in inbox of your transactional mails (subscription, order confirmation, etc.)Follow results of your sendings in real timeEnjoy of a dedicated customer service, by phone or EmailSee our tutorial : https://resources.sendinblue.com/en/plugin-prestashop/

module.name: realexredirect
module.description: Realex Payment’s online payments solution helps over 13,000 businesses sell online and securely processes billions in transactions every year
module.author: Coccinet
module.description_full: Realex Payment’s online payments solution helps over 13,000 businesses sell online and securely processes billions in transactions every year. We deliver an awesome payments experience and we have experts at hand to guide you every step of the way.   Be inspired by our 5 star Trustpilot rating: We know the value of personal customer service which is why you can always speak to a member of our support team, anytime.
module.additional_description: Productivity : Improve your website securityOur seamless payment page allows your customers to easily make payments online.We ensure you offer the perfect combination of payment methods to your customers allowing you to maximise online sales for your business. We deliver a fully customisable payment experience that integrates with your brand and is supported by our powerful technology.Our commitment to innovation ensures you have access to the latest payment technologiesOur payment solution includes 30+ fraud checks & 3D secure authentication.

module.name: onboarding

module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: The OnBoarding module greets first-time users to their PrestaShop back office: through a small playful interface, it shows the user how to launch his/her shop in several easy steps.

module.name: veplatform
module.description: The only automated marketing solution to solve your abandonment & conversion problems at every stage in the customer’s journey
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The only automated marketing solution to solve your abandonment & conversion problems at every stage in the customer’s journey.  Start using Ve today with our 30-day free trial!
module.additional_description: The Problem: 98% of visitors to your website are not buying from you. On top of that, shopping cart abandonment is the reason 3 out of 4 of your potential customers aren’t purchasing. How does Ve solve this? Engages with users who are about to leave the siteRe-engages lost customers and bringing them back to your siteIncreases your website’s revenueImproves your customer’s experience onsite Benefits of Ve: Turn passive visitors into customers – engage with visitors on your site and once they’ve left Easy to use – simple setup, maintenance and transparent pricing model (pay on performance – you only pay when customers convert)Data-driven solutions – our insights into customer behaviour help us deliver the right message at the right timeCentralised brand management & customisable campaigns – upload your logo and font for brand consistency, change copy & messaging to suit the campaign.Will grow with your business – take advantage of enhanced and new features as your business growsComprehensive FAQs – take advantage of our expertise

module.name: bluesnap
module.description: BlueSnap is a global payment gateway and so much more
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: BlueSnap is a global payment gateway and so much more.  We offer the widest global support in the industry plus 110 different payment types including all of Tier 1 credit cards, diner cards, PayPal, E-checks and wire transfers. PrestaShop and BlueSnap help shoppers make purchases easily and securely with the free BlueSnap module.
module.additional_description: Sell globally with no developmentEasy all-in-one global payment module supportingVISA, MasterCard, Amex, Discover, JCB, Diners Club, Carte BleuePaypal, Alipay, Ukash, Skrill, and more+ 110 of the most preferred alternative payment methods worldwideDon’t install more than one module for paymentsReduce cart abandonment with localized checkout pagesModule automatically renders checkout page in shopper’s local language, local currency, and preferred local payment typeMore transactions approved because of our intelligent payment routing technologyCompetitive pricing starting at 2.9% + 30C per approved transactionCheckout page optimized for mobile and desktop

module.name: nostotagging
module.displayName: Nosto - The Complete Personalization Solution for PrestaShop
module.description: Nosto harnesses big data to build a deep understanding of every customer in real-time, automatically predicting and delivering the most relevant shopping experiences wherever your customers are
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Nosto harnesses big data to build a deep understanding of every customer in real-time, automatically predicting and delivering the most relevant shopping experiences wherever your customers are.
module.additional_description: Increase customer lifetime value, average order value and conversion by personalizing the whole funnel:Acquire - Drive qualified traffic to your storeConvert - Encourage hesitant shoppers to continue to the checkoutRetain - Produce loyal customers and inspire return visits to your storeOptimize - Have full control to continually improve performance ...all the personalization tools you need in one solution. Pay only a small % of the revenue Nosto helps you generate!

module.name: easymarketing

module.author: Silbersaiten
module.description_full: NEW: easymarketing - the smart way to advertise on Google Shopping Instantly more effective online campaigns with 38%* lower customer acquisition cost -*Google Benchmark, 2015 Prove it yourself - Sign-up for a free, 2 months trial
module.additional_description: easymarketing is the exclusive Google SMB Premium Partner in the UK easymarketing’s technology manages your Google Shopping campaign to maximise both impact & sales We take the worry out of online marketing saving YOU time & money   Get YOUR ad campaigns onlineConnecting to your Web-shopManaging your Data FeedCreating your CampaignsUploading onto Google & facebook  Maximise YOUR sales & minimise YOUR customer acquisition cost Not only does easymarketing’s state of the art technology offer a 38% lower customer acquisition cost* right from the start, - it is also recommended & fully supported by Google with the highest certification levelManaging your marketing campaignsOptimising CPC biddingOptimising to impact sales - constantly

module.name: klarnaofficial
module.description: Offer Klarna Checkout and Invoice/Account payments to your customers through Klarnas services. Your customers will pay for the order after delivery
module.author: Prestaworks
module.description_full: Offer Klarna Checkout and Invoice/Account payments to your customers through Klarnas services. Your customers will pay for the order after delivery.
module.additional_description: Easy to use It’s easy to get started with Klarna through the module developed by Prestaworks. Klarna’s fully automated invoices will minimize your administration.No risk, you will always get paid Klarna assumes all potential financial risks for both the consumer and the e-store, meaning the e-store always gets paid, since Klarna assumes the fraud and credit risk.Less friction, more sales Klarna maximizes conversion rates by simplifying buying for your e-store’s consumers. More people who enter the checkout will actually complete their purchase.Optimized for all devices Since there’s no login or need for filling out card numbers – Klarna’s payment methods will increase conversion. Without friction, mobiles can perform as well as desktops.Main features of Klarna Klarna Checkout will increase your conversion rate and allow your customers to pay for the goods after delivery.

module.name: oneandonehosting
module.description: At 1&1 you’ll find the perfect hosting package for your needs. And thanks to convenient 1-click installation, setting up PrestaShop is especially easy The default offer is for the USA
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: At 1&1 you’ll find the perfect hosting package for your needs. And thanks to convenient 1-click installation, setting up PrestaShop is especially easy The default offer is for the USA.  Please click here to benefit from the UK special offer and here if you are based in Canada
module.additional_description: Further advantages you can benefit from with 1&1 New Hosting:Choose from 40 Click & Build Apps including PrestaShop1&1 Expert App Support available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week – with advice and practical help specific to the application you’re usingMaximum availability thanks to the geo-redundant hosting of your website in two geographically separate data centres1&1 SiteLock included, keeping your website virus-freeGuaranteed performance from 2 GB RAM (with the 1&1 Unlimited Plus package) Domain included free with select packages (.co.uk, .com, .net, .org, .me.uk or .org.uk)Unlimited power: Unlimited webspace, traffic, and MySQL databases

module.name: alipay
module.displayName: Alipay Official - the leading ePayment solution for China
module.description: Alipay is an affiliate of Alibaba Group and the leading ePayment solution for China, processing roughly 50% of the total online transactions
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Alipay is an affiliate of Alibaba Group and the leading ePayment solution for China, processing roughly 50% of the total online transactions. It is a secure and convenient solution and preferred by over 400 million active members.
module.additional_description: What is Alipay? Alipay is an affiliate of Alibaba Group and the leading third-party online payment solution for China. The significantly growing interest by Chinese shoppers in Western brands create large opportunities for Western companies with 67% of Chinese luxury spending occurring outside Chinese borders. If you are offering maternity products, food supplements, fashion, beauty or jewellery, Alipay will create an astonishing opportunity for you, opening up the Chinese market.

module.name: smartsupp
module.description: Activate Smartsupp on your PrestaShop online store. Smartsupp is a free live chat with visitor recording. Your customers are on your website right now
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Activate Smartsupp on your PrestaShop online store. Smartsupp is a free live chat with visitor recording. Your customers are on your website right now. Chat with them and see what they do.
module.additional_description: Answer visitors' questions instantlyimprove customer relationsIncrease conversion rate (impact of Smartsupp on conversion rate is measurable in Google Analytics)Understand behavior of your customers

module.name: amzpayments
module.description: Amazon Payments makes it easy for millions of Amazon customers to login and pay on third party websites using the payment and shipping information stored in their Amazon accounts
module.author: Patworx Multimedia
module.description_full: Amazon Payments makes it easy for millions of Amazon customers to login and pay on third party websites using the payment and shipping information stored in their Amazon accounts. Amazon Payments can help merchants add new customers, increase sales and turn casual browsers into buyers. It’s fast, easy and trusted — leverage the Amazon brand to grow your business. If you are based in the UK please use this link here to register to Amazon Payments  If you are based in the USA please use this link here to register to Amazon Payments
module.additional_description: Make it easy for millions of Amazon customers to login and pay in your Prestashop shop, using the addresses and payment information stored in their Amazon accounts. It's fast, simple and secure.

module.name: g2apay
module.description: G2A Pay is a global payment gateway providing a solution to accept 150+ payment methods to grow your sales. Connect to international customers by localizing their buying experience wherever they pay
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: G2A Pay is a global payment gateway providing a solution to accept 150+ payment methods to grow your sales. Connect to international customers by localizing their buying experience wherever they pay.
module.additional_description: Increased Conversion Rate Accept 150+ global payment methods in 80 currencies to let your customers pay with the payment methods they know and use. Keep returning customers and gain new ones by offering simple solutions that generate conversion.

module.name: pilipay
module.description: Pilibaba overcomes the barriers of cross-border eCommerce to China and Pilibaba gateway is a basic and essential tool for all existing western online stores into China market
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Pilibaba overcomes the barriers of cross-border eCommerce to China and Pilibaba gateway is a basic and essential tool for all existing western online stores into China market.  Combined with Free Marketing, Payment Gateways, Local Fulfillment.
module.additional_description: Under Pilibaba's support, your website will obtain below features : 1. Get integration with PiliPay supported by UnionPay / AliPay / WechatPay to cover all user demands.2. Get clear guaranteed landed price checkout page in Chinese.3. Get Customs Compliance with all orders to avoid being returned.4. Get free marketing support -traffic generation in China market, 20 free publishing channels to greatly improve your brand recognition including frequently exposued products on our marketpalce http://www.pilibaba.com/cnTotally free work of translation and uploading.5. Get products descriptions in Chinese and localized introduction page of your products to raise conversion.6. Get domestic logistics support -shipping to a Pilibaba designated domestic warehouse all over the world with efficient re-label. Pilibaba handles customs clearance and door-to-door delivery anywhere in China professionally and efficiently.7. Get free mandarin after-sale and pre-sale service team to guarantee 100% customer satisfaction. Pre-installed in Prestashop, activate Pilibaba module within 1 minute and you are able to accept orders from 1.3 Billion Chinese customers immediately !

module.name: etranslation
module.description: 9 out of 10 internet users prefer browsing sites in their native language
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: 9 out of 10 internet users prefer browsing sites in their native language. Don't miss the Cross-Border train! Invest in an optimised translation  and make the most of our native translators and automatic content export and translation import tools
module.additional_description: Translation by qualified, native translators who are e-commerce specialistsA made-to-measure, personalised service. We are not a translation platform                                                                                                                               The most reasonable rates, thanks to our free repetition policy (an average of 20 to 35% of an e-commerce site is repeated)Automated content export and translation import

module.name: onehopsmsservice
module.description: Sending SMS made easy on Prestashop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Sending SMS made easy on Prestashop. Whether it's sending auto confirmation messages or keeping your customers posted on the delivery status, Onehop can help you improve your Customer Interaction using SMS. Experience the magic of SMS!
module.additional_description: Send Order Confirmation to buyers. Send Shipment Confirmation updates. Send Delivery Confirmation on delivery of the shipment. Send Out of Stock Product Alerts. Send Back in Stock Product Alerts.

module.name: googleshopping
module.description: Google Shopping helps businesses like you tap into the power of customer intent to reach the right people with relevant products ads, when it matters the most
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Google Shopping helps businesses like you tap into the power of customer intent to reach the right people with relevant products ads, when it matters the most.  With Google Shopping, increase your sales by at least 30% !
module.additional_description: With Google Shopping, put your product images, price, and business name right in front of people searching on Google, no matter what device they're using. Benefits:Increase visits to your shop being displayed among the 100 billions monthly Google searches Minimize workload and go-to-market time: Use the product information you already have in PrestaShop without needing to create separate files to submit to GoogleData accuracy: Continuously import fresh data from your store on PrestaShop without any additional workImprove conversion rate thanks to qualified Google trafic as well as your ranking in the search engine

module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block with several links.
